monsters.name: Goblin Sneak
monsters.description: A crafty goblin with patched armor and a wicked grin.

monsters.name: Giant Rat
monsters.description: A squealing rat the size of a dog, baring needle teeth.

monsters.name: Restless Skeleton
monsters.description: Bones clatter as it raises a rusted sword to challenge the heroes.

monsters.name: Goblin King
monsters.description: The Goblin King lounges on a pile of trinkets, ready to defend his hoard.
